comment.author: 34517346@N02
comment._content: The banner is for the Woman's National Wilson and Marshall Organization. The New York Times states that Mrs. J. Borden (Daisy) Harriman was the founder and chairman. They were active at least through the 1912 election. See: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9805E2DB123CE633A...

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Florence Jaffray "Daisy" Harriman (July 21, 1870 – August 31, 1967) was an American socialite, suffragist, social reformer, organizer, and later, a courageous diplomat. “She led one of the suffrage parades down Fifth Avenue, worked on campaigns on child labor and safe milk and, as minister to Norway in World War II, organized evacuation efforts while hiding in a forest from the Nazi invasion. "In her ninety-second year, U.S. President John F. Kennedy honored her by awarding her the first “Citation of Merit for Distinguished Service.” She often found herself in the middle of historic events. As she stated, “I think nobody can deny that I have always had through sheer luck. . . a box seat at the America of my times.” Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Florence_Jaffray_Harriman

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton:  Thanks for pointing us to Harriman's full name.  We'll add it to the description next time we update the record.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC has mislabeled this photo. That actually is Mrs. Vibbirt speaking, while Daisy Harriman stands silent beside her.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of Mrs. Vibbirt, speaker for the Woman's National Wilson and Marshall Organization, addressing a rally in Union Square, New York City, August 20, 1913:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2948784299/]

Daisy Harriman tosses campaign buttons into the crowd:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2368281179/]

Boys in the Union Square crowd grab for the buttons, almost starting a riot:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2369111942/]
